feed.title: Bill Shupp's PEAR channel Latest Releases

entry.title: Deneb 0.4.0 (alpha)
entry.content:
Deneb provides a consistent CRUD interface to using Zend_Db base models and model collections, as well as segregated read and write DB pools and selectors
* Added support for creating a record with the primary key value supplied * After creation, all values are updated in the current object * Updated tests to work with PHPUnit 3.5

entry.title: Deneb 0.3.0 (alpha)
entry.content:
Deneb provides a consistent CRUD interface to using Zend_Db base models and model collections, as well as segregated read and write DB pools and selectors
* Added countAll() method for collections * Added delayed fetch (no automatic trip to DB) for collections

entry.title: EZRP 0.2.1 (alpha)
entry.content:
See ezrp.me for details
* Added EZRP::getProfileData(), only the twitter driver is supported though * Updated twitter oauth url * Prepped 0.2.0 release

entry.title: EZRP 0.2.0 (alpha)
entry.content:
See ezrp.me for details
* Added EZRP::getProfileData(), only the twitter driver is supported though * Updated twitter oauth url * Prepped 0.2.0 release

entry.title: Predict 0.2.2 (alpha)
entry.content:
Predict is a partial PHP port of the Gpredict (http://gpredict.oz9aec.net/) program that allows real-time tracking and orbit prediction of satellites from two line element sets. It supports the SGP4 and SDP4 models for prediction.
* Addec Predict_TLE::createChecksum() * Updates to examples

entry.title: Predict 0.2.0 (alpha)

Predict is a partial PHP port of the Gpredict (http://gpredict.oz9aec.net/) program that allows real-time tracking and orbit prediction of satellites from two line element sets. It supports the SGP4 and SDP4 models for prediction.

entry.title: Predict 0.1.2 (alpha)
entry.content:
Predict is a partial PHP port of the Gpredict (http://gpredict.oz9aec.net/) program that allows real-time tracking and orbit prediction of satellites from two line element sets. It supports the SGP4 and SDP4 models for prediction.
* Added Predict_Time::getEpochTimeStamp()

entry.title: Predict 0.1.1 (alpha)
entry.content:
Predict is a partial PHP port of the Gpredict (http://gpredict.oz9aec.net/) program that allows real-time tracking and orbit prediction of satellites from two line element sets. It supports the SGP4 and SDP4 models for prediction.
* Fixed minimum elevation bug in visible pass detection * Updated precision of Pogson's Ratio, refactored calculate magnitude to be more readble, as well as added comments

entry.title: Predict 0.1.0 (alpha)

Predict is a partial PHP port of the Gpredict (http://gpredict.oz9aec.net/) program that allows real-time tracking and orbit prediction of satellites from two line element sets. It supports the SGP4 and SDP4 models for prediction.
* Initial release

entry.title: RandomString 0.1.0 (alpha)
entry.content:
Easy creation of random strings, limiting by lower case, upper case, numeric, and puncuation characters
* Initial release

entry.title: Services_IPPower 0.0.1 (alpha)
entry.content:
Only supports SetPower command right now
* Initial release
